title: Inmate accidentally released from jail back in custody
description: The inmate has been accused of shooting a family member.

title: Wayne Shorter, jazz saxophone pioneer, dies at 89
description: Influential jazz innovator Wayne Shorter, whose lyrical jazz compositions and pioneering saxophone playing sounded through more than half a century of American music, has died

title: Federal Reserve officials sound warnings about higher rates
description: A run of strong economic data and signs that inflation remains stubbornly high could lead the Federal Reserve to raise its benchmark rate higher in the coming months than it has previously forecast, several Fed officials say

title: Station manager in deadly train collision in Greece faces manslaughter charges
description: A station manager faces manslaughter charges following a deadly high-speed train collision that killed dozens of people in Greece, his attorney said Thursday.

title: Pence won’t say whether he'd support Trump as 2024 nominee
description: Former Vice President Mike Pence isn't saying whether he'd back Donald Trump if Trump were to be the Republican presidential nominee in 2024

title: Former `Sweetie Pie's' star sentenced in nephew's killing
description: A former star of a St. Louis-based reality show has been sentenced to life in prison for arranging the killing of his nephew to collect a life insurance policy

title: Walmart to expand 28 stores with health care centers in 2024
description: Walmart plans to add more than two dozen health care centers to some of its stores next year, as the retailer moves deeper into providing primary care and other services

title: 5 key takeaways from the Alex Murdaugh double murder trial
description: As deliberations are underway, here's a look at five key moments from the Alex Murdaugh double murder trial.

title: NTSB: Key tank car part melted after Ohio train derailment
description: The National Transportation Safety Board says the fire in last month’s Ohio train derailment melted a key part of the tank cars filled with toxic chemicals

title: Officials plan to name skatepark after Tyre Nichols
description: Less than two months after the death of Tyre Nichols, a California skatepark could be named after the Sacramento native.

title: House subcommittee will investigate claims against Santos, who is 'fully cooperating'
description: George Santos said Thursday that he is "fully cooperating" with the House Ethics Committee, which is investigating numerous allegations against him

title: Biden says he will visit East Palestine 'at some point' after toxic train derailment
description: Biden's been pressed to visit the site since a Norfolk Southern freight train carrying hazardous materials derailed on Feb. 3.

title: Snowboarder caught on video escaping New Hampshire avalanche
description: An onlooker managed to shoot video of a snowboarder narrowly escaping an avalanche in New Hampshire

title: Panthers founder, former owner Jerry Richardson dies at 86
description: Jerry Richardson, the Carolina Panthers founder and for years one of the NFL’s most influential owners until a scandal forced him to sell the team, has died

title: Florida prosecutor faces scrutiny after TV crew attack
description: Florida Gov. Ron DeSantis’ office has asked for records from a state attorney regarding a suspect in the fatal shootings last week of a TV reporter, a 9-year-old girl and a woman

title: NY's 1st batch of marijuana shop licenses is doubling to 300
description: New York is doubling the number of licenses it’s awarding for a first round of legal marijuana shops

title: Trump shouldn't be shielded from lawsuits related to Jan. 6, Justice Department says
description: Trump shouldn't be entitled to immunity from lawsuits that aim to hold him accountable for the Jan. 6 assault on the U.S. Capitol, the Justice Department said Thursday

title: Olympian who dropped dog's meds on skin avoids doping ban
description: A three-month investigation has exonerated a five-time Olympian of doping

title: COVID call centers and testing sites close as US moves past the pandemic
description: COVID-19 call centers and testing sites across the U.S. are shutting down as Americans look to move past the pandemic.

title: WATCH:  These 2 dogs have the cutest meetup spot
description: Get yourself a bestie like Dublin, who loves to regularly check in on his furry neighbor at their fence.

title: Murdaugh juror removed from murder trial for talking about case to friends
description: A juror was removed from the Alex Murdaugh double murder trial Thursday morning after the judge learned she had been talking about the case to her friends.

title: WATCH:  Dog rescued from rubble weeks after Turkey earthquake
description: Rescuers in Turkey saved a dog named Aleks from a collapsed building after he was stuck under the rubble for over 20 days.

title: Men shot, killed bald eagle with intention to eat it: Officials
description: A Nebraska Sheriff’s office cited two men for allegedly hunting a bald eagle with the intention of cooking and eating the national bird.

title: Gunmen leave Argentine soccer star Messi a menacing message
description: Police say gunmen have left a threatening message for Argentine soccer superstar Lionel Messi and opened fire at a supermarket owned by his in-laws in Argentina’s third-largest city

title: US Drought Monitor: Rain, snow slash California drought
description: Tremendous rains and snowfall since late last year have freed half of California from drought

title: Tennessee measure restricting drag shows heads to governor
description: Tennessee lawmakers have advanced legislation on certain drag shows on public property or at private establishments where children could attend

title: Idaho murders: Knife, gun among items seized from suspect's family home
description: When the suspect in the University of Idaho murders was taken into custody, a knife and a Glock 22 gun were among the items seized by law enforcement.

title: California declares emergency in counties buried by snow as latest storm moves east
description: The latest storm system to hit the West Coast was expected to move out of the region on Thursday and bring severe weather across the South.

title: Michigan attorney general among target of plot to kill Jewish state officials
description: Michigan Attorney General Dana Nessel says she was among those targeted in a plot to kill Jewish state leaders.

title: Applications for jobless claims fall for 3rd straight week
description: The number of people applying for unemployment benefits in the U.S. fell for third straight week

title: Germany: Teen dies after being shot by 81-year-old neighbor
description: German authorities say a 16-year-old boy has died after being shot in the head by an 81-year-old neighbor

title: The economy has delivered good news. Are recession fears over?
description: By many measures, the economy is humming but recession worries persist.

title: Blinken, Lavrov meet briefly as US-Russia tensions soar
description: U.S. Secretary of State Antony Blinken and Russian Foreign Minister Sergey Lavrov have spoken briefly at a meeting of top diplomats from the Group of 20 nations

title: High school stabbing leaves 1 student dead, another wounded
description: A 15-year-old suspect was arrested, police said.

title: Trump and more 2024 hopefuls gather for CPAC -- but other big names stay away
description: CPAC, a longtime window into the grassroots of the GOP, in recent years has morphed into a prominent stage for allies of former President Donald Trump

title: Skeletal remains of man missing since 2013 found 5 miles from where he vanished
description: Human skeletal remains found in a wooded area has been identified by authorities as belonging to Christopher Story, a man who suddenly went missing almost 10 years ago.

title: SpaceX launches US, Russia, UAE astronauts to space station
description: SpaceX has launched four astronauts to the International Space Station for NASA

title: US approves selling Taiwan munitions worth $619 million
description: The U.S. has approved a round of arms sales to Taiwan consisting of $619 million worth of munitions for F-16 fighter jets

title: WATCH:  English bulldog named Fendi refuses to drop knife
description: This English bulldog refused to give up a knife despite her owner’s desperate pleas to drop it.

title: Chicago police officer fatally shot responding to call: Officials
description: A Chicago police officer was shot and killed Wednesday while responding to a call about a person with a firearm, according to the Chicago Police Department.

title: Tesla says it will cut costs of next generation cars in half
description: Tesla says it will cut the cost of its next generation of vehicles in half, largely by using innovative manufacturing techniques and smaller factories

title: N. Korea wants more control over farming amid food shortage
description: North Korean leader Kim Jong Un has vowed to strengthen state control over agriculture and make all available efforts to increase grain production, as the country faces a worsening food shortage

title: Mummy at least 600 years old found in food delivery bag
description: A man stopped for drinking in a park in Peru was found to be in possession of more than just a container of alcohol.
